text: @charliekirk11 The media also didn’t criticize BLM or other social injustice protesting with no social distancing whatsoever. They even promoted the idiotic idea that no social distancing was necessary because coronavirus isn’t a risk anymore but now it’s a risk because Trump is having a rally?
